name: Edge Matching Puzzle
author: Alucard648
info: Rotate FFCs so adjacent edges of them match and does not cause cutoff.Done on request by SkyFlare.Update 9.6.2022 - minor refactoring
description: 3*3 rotating tiles. Match connecting pixels to open secrets.
setup: 1,Place 3*3 FFCs spaced so their centers are speced apart by 2 combos. Check demo quest to see how combos are set up2. Import and compile the script. Requires ffcscript.zhD0-D3 edge IDs, up, right, down and left. For puzzle to be solved, all IDs on adjacent FFCs must match.For instance One FFC has D0 to 1 and same number on another FFCs D2.D4 - Set to 1 for FFC to be able to be rotated.D5 - Set to 1 to prevent initial rotation randomization of this FFC.Must set "Run Script at Screen Init" and "Only Visible to Lens of Truth" flags.
